sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-card
        class="px-3"
        flat
        tile
        outlined>
        <v-card-text>
            <v-row>
                <v-col cols="3">
                    <v-text-field
                        v-model="phase.name"
                        :rules="[rules.required]"
                        class="rounded-0 mt-3"
                        label="Name"
                        outlined
                        type="text"
                        required>
                    </v-text-field>
                </v-col>
                <v-col cols="3">
                    <v-text-field
                        v-model="phase.description"
                        :rules="[rules.required]"
                        class="rounded-0 mt-3"
                        label="Description"
                        outlined
                        type="text"
                        required>
                    </v-text-field>
                </v-col>
                <v-col cols="3">
                    <v-text-field
                        v-model="phase.start_date"
                        :rules="[rules.required]"
                        class="rounded-0 mt-3"
                        label="Start Date"
                        outlined
                        type="text"
                        required>
                    </v-text-field>
                </v-col>
                <v-col cols="3">
                    <v-text-field
                        v-model="phase.end_date"
                        :rules="[rules.required]"
                        class="rounded-0 mt-3"
                        label="End Date"
                        outlined
                        type="text"
                        required>
                    </v-text-field>
                </v-col>
            </v-row>
        </v-card-text>
        <v-card-actions class="pb-2 justify-end">
            <v-btn
                class="px-10 primary rounded-0 text-capitalize"
                dark
                @click="openDialog()"
                depressed>
                Edit Plan
            </v-btn>
        </v-card-actions>
    </v-card>


</template>
<script>
export default {
    name: 'PhaseCard',
    props: {
        phase: Object,
    },
    data() {
        return {
            valid: false,
            phase_name: '',
            rules: {
                required: value => !!value || 'Required.',
            }
        }
    },
    methods: {
        openDialog() {
            this.$emit("open-dialog");
        },
    },
}
</script>
